game.name: Pixel Escape
game.description:
The highly exciting and engaging pixel world is awaiting you!! A type of unique problem has come today as the entire world began glitching in Pixeland. The only way to save your existence is run forward. Do you think that you are a true escaper? Join Pixel Escape and be prepared to help a character to run and escape from the continuously moving ball! Try to avoid the dangers like lava pits and spikes when your pixel character is running forward!
It will be in your hands to save the world from the uninvited dangers. Do not bother at all as you can easily overcome hazards by using your magic ink. You cannot keep your eyes off the screen for a single second as the giant fire ball is chasing you behind. Apart from this, there are many obstacles and deadly traps to deal with in this HTML5 endless runner game. The awesome 8bit soundtrack and colorful pixelart graphics will be enough to keep you engrossed for hours. 
This unique gameplay will allow you to draw with magic ink by using your mouse and protect the little and cute pixels against the deadly drops, lava and spikes. You can use mouse or spacebar to jump your character. Try to grab gray pixels, and not to die and save the lives of all the little pixels! We are damn sure that you are having a great fun when you play this ball pixel jump game in your mobile phones. Enjoy more fun escape games on atmegame.com for free without download!
